tool_description: An API showing all the latest West Ham United Football Club News
name: West Ham United Football Club Live
title: West Ham United Football Club Live
tool_name: West Ham United Football Club Live

api_list.name: Get All West Ham United Football Club News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about West Ham United Football Club.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://west-ham-united-football-club-live.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "west-ham-united-football-club-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get News About West Ham United Football Club from a specific news resource.
